answers.answer: Not you that upset me, just that I may have lost a very close friend only b'c I was concerned for her and her babies health.  There are a LOT of very opinionated people on this forum and I have seen several post previous to mine that have been brutal in my opinion.  I was just always taught that if you don't have anything nice to say or words of encouragement you should maybe just keep it to yourself, not that others opinions should not be valued however not when there meant only to hurt.  I look forward to this site from the very moment that I log on in the morning and look to others with more experience then myself for advice - you are one of those people.  I guess I just have to learn to not take stuff so personally but with the hormones raging some days its just not so easy to do.I look forward to your words of encouragement in future questions or issues, it was not you I was refering to at all.Thank you soooo much for your concern over my feelings, it just justifies why I come here everyday

Well you both have mis understood what i meantYes you did tell her  and yes you told her so but I didnt mean or think you would go and say I told you so -who would.Some of the other posts understood what I meant by thatMost would agree, smoking pot while pregnant is not a very smart thing to do.

None of my comments are meant to hurt anyones feelings they are my feelingsWhether smoking pot, unprotected sex,Im sure there are alot of people that dont agree with doing it!!I just voice my opinion others  may not.I believe a baby is a gift and when a women becomes pregnant she should make every  reasonable decisions for the health of her child--not for the satisfaction of herself

Its hard on boards and in email since the *tone* of how things are said can't really be picked up.I only seem to have one small problem here and its what I'm guessing to be the young adults wanting to know if they are pregnant. No one could give them that answer and its frustrating.  Everytime I read one I feel like screaming at the computer buy a test, actually it wouldn't bother me so much if an open forum was used for it. Seems like theres 2-3 a week posted as their own thread. I guess it bothers me due to the pregnancy hormones !!

Wisegirl it is not pg hormones because I am NOT pg and I HATE those posts as well.  I am sorry but I feel the way you do.  Buy a test.  If it is positive then come on and ask what you need to but we CANNOT tell you for sure.  I agree with you also on the "tone".  I have posted things that when I read it it sounds bad but I NEVER meant it that way.Cinnamon - I got your back girly.  We have actually agreed on quite a bit.  I understand what you meant with the "I told you so comment".  You would NEVER say that to someone but I understand that when you talk to someone til you are blue in the face and something happens you do tend to think that for a brief second of course you feel bad after but I think we have all done it at one time.  Take Care

I AM DONE!!!!!!!!!!!   I really miss being pg but I do not want to nurse ever again and I just cannot bring myself to formula feed for some reason so I am done.  I got my boy and my girl what more do I need.Cinn - I am with you on the bikini.  I used to wear one until I was about 21 then one morning I woke up with hips and a dinner table on my backside.  Then at 25 had my first baby and now the flabby belly skin.  I keep telling my family I am going to apply for the Swan or Extreme Makeover.  LOL!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!  O well as long as DH still loves me I guess I can live with it for a while or at least until ABC calls for the shows I mentioned.  LOL!!!!!!!  Take Care

I think we also have to remember that topics like women smoking pot while they're pregnant can really get women worked up, especially considering so many women on this board have lost their babies.  We come on this board with our fears about pregnancy and are hopes for our babies, and to hear about pregnant pot smokers can get things pretty heated.  I know it can make my blood boil.  I'd like to reinerate to Trixie that we are all on your side.  I re-read all the messages on your last post, and everyone seemed to be on your side.  I really hope it all works out with your friend. Mary

Kristen-- sounds like not too long to go for your pink bundle of joy, Im glad bed rest worked!!  When your there you wish you were at home and when your at home you wish you could go on bed rest!!!  lol....Best of LuckBlondie-- like always Your there!!
Whats a bikini??After 3 kids for get itI love the tatoo thing thats sweet!!

LOL.. yea im going on walks and trying to a do a diet.. but ya know how easter is.. all the candy candy candy and treats.. lol.. soo hard... maybe ill be able to fit a bikini this year.. depends on how many pounds my ass will lose first.. LOL~*Chloe*~
My ass never fit a bikiniNever will

Hi Everyone! I haven't been on here in a while because I'm in the hospital on bedrest. I was admitted on 3/18 with Preeclampsia. So far the bedrest is doing the trick to keep me stable. I'm 35 weeks, 3 days, and my Dr is planning to do an Amnio on Tues to test for lung maturity and possibly deliver me sometime in my 36th week. Baby is breech, (still!) so it is possible I may have a C-Section. If for some reason she turns, we will have an induction. It's been hard being on bedrest and thinking about all the things I could and want to be doing at home. I'm am glad that they are keeping me in the hospital, instead of bedrest at home. I think I would worry all the time and never be able to stay in bed enough. Dh and my Mom have been wonderful about doing things for me. I feel pretty ready with everything at home for Baby's arrival. We can't wait to see her! I'll try to keep you posted on things. Hope everyone is doing good. Take care! Kristen

ROFLi can't believe you just said that....a dinner table on your back side, i lovingly call mine 'the shelf'.i will say i started this southbeach diet and it is by far the easiest diet to do and stick to!  although, i did cheat a lot over easter!~nanci

Thanks girls, Its always cinnamon the one who stirs things upbut its not meant to hurt anyone's feelingsThere is being supportive of people yes, but when you dont agree with it are we suppose to lie and say  (for example)post:  I had unprotected sex with four guys   Im pregnant 8 weeks  and dont know who the father isOkay how do you respond?1.  Its okay honey  your baby will be wonderful maybe the father will come around but for then live on assistance all will work out2. Be responsible use protection!!  You will now need to take a paternity test!There are way too many women and men  who dont take care of their children, have unwanted pregnancies, drink,do drugs,I dont know but my parents taught me that if I make my bed lie in itI have made reasonable choices in my life, yes there are "accidents" like a rape, etc... thats totally different its when you KNOW your pregnant,and make bad choices  or have unprotected sex   you are asking for trouble.

are you crazzyy?? LOL.. i was reading your post to me on my last post.. No.. theres not gonna be another baby for a long while.. Ashton is enough to handle... I will admit though.. I start feeling sad when i see other ladies walking around with big bellies.. makes me miss mine.. also when i go shopping in the mall and i see alllll those lil pink dresses and hair bows makes me want a girl badly.. I mess around with my husband by taking ashtons hair up on the top and i say **just enough for a pebbles doo!! My husband has started talking about another but this year id like to rest from baby making and enjoy one summer of actually being able to squeeze into a bikini... LOL.. anyways.. whens your next =c) Btw.. I got ashtons footprints tattooed on my left shoulder.. I took his birth certificate with me.. had them printed and had them put on me.. plus his name and bday under them.. im scared to have another baby.. id have to get their footprints on the other side.. and i tell ya.. that S@%* hurt badly!! lol~*Chloe*~

nanakay-- what does the south beach diet include?? I need to start exercising to get back into some kind of shape. Round is a shape isnt it?I say I look Like Pamela Anderson on top and Roseanne Barr on the bottom!! lol...........

I know both me and my husband have gained weight since we got married. He says its my cooking.The other day (I thought this was funny) I bought him new underwear i pulled them out of the package He says there way too big  XL i dont wear that(which he does)  I said try them on all sizes fit different(being nice)  Low and behold they Fit!!He never said a word after that.

my dh has gained himself since we got married but he is also one of those people that say oh i think i'll shed 5 pounds and go in the bathroom step on the scale and it's gone.i wish i could do that!what is funny.....talk about poetic justice...ok my dh and i went to highschool with this girl that all through highschool she was just tiny, and commented one time how she didn't know why people that are overweight don't 'just do something about it'well.....she is now married to one of dh's co-workers....i about died laughing the first time i saw her after all these years.....she is bigger around than i ever thought of being...and i have always had a big butt.  she has had 2 children but she had gained the weight prior to having them.  she has been trying to take the weight off ever since and can't.  i want to ask 'her question' so bad, but i just be nice to her and don't even mention it.....funny though being over weight herself has sure mellowed her attitude out. (she's actually nice now) haha~nanci

I think they call that day ja voo  (how ever do you spell that)Well us big arse people are happierOne girl i know lost a ton of weight I asked her how she did It she said find your husband in bed with another women and you lose weight. I said to my husband I guess were happily married.

yah i've known a couple people on diets similar to that one.....those diets are hell to follow emotionally though!well good luck to you and i hope you enjoy the south beach....i even got my dh to try some of the recipes. (he usually turns his nose up to any kind of vegitable.)~nanci

I was reading Baby magazine last night and it had the section where people write in.  The topic was sex after having a baby.  A man wrote in and was telling that he had made a huge mistake and told his wife why he was not wanting sex.  He told her that she was too fat to turn him on because she had gained 70 pounds while pregnant with twins last year and had only lost 20.  Now he wants to know how he can make it up to her.  What an ass!  I am so glad my DH is not like that.  He says he cant tell i have even gained except of course my enormous belly!  He is lying, but how sweet!

you know it is really good.  it is all good carbs vs. bad carbs.  and the book is really easy to read...not like some of those diet books that you are bored reading after the first paragraph...i'm the type that wants to get down to the nitty gritty NOW and this book does.  it also gives a meal plan for every phase (there are 3) and recipes for each phase!i started about a 2 weeks before easter (silly i know) and i was amazed at how i didn't really 'crave' sweets. (i'm a junk food junkie, dh has the easter candy locked up for me now).speaking of dh being sweet....my dh is awsome, he always tell me i look fine and beautiful and that he loves me just the way i am....so i explain to him that i love him for that but i am not comfortable in my body and that is keeping me from doing stuff for him that i know he would like :)so he supports what i want and....locked all the candy my son got for easter in our safe.as far as the jerk that wrote in and told his wife that she was too fat....he will never make it up to her....words cut deeper than he will ever know.~nanci

question: Trixie-I'm so sorry that I upset you.I was reacting more to what Cinnamon said that didn't sit quite right with me (my own problem, perhaps-I recognize that!).I stand by my advice to simply be there for her.  She is likely working through some very conflicting emotions.  Of course you did the right thing in encouraging her to stop smoking pot.Once again, my apologies and ladies--feel free to use this as an open forum, too.
title: Trixie--I'm sorry for upsetting you! (Open forum)
